question: With which company GE Aviation patnered to make aircraft engine components in India?
explanation: GE Aviation and Tata Advanced Systems Ltd (TASL) have entered into a partnership to manufacture, assemble, integrate and test aircraft components. GE Aviation and TASL will jointly manufacture CFM International LEAP engine components in India, catering to the global market. CFM International LEAP engine is currently considered as world's leading jet engine. It has also been announced that both the companies will jointly pursue military engine and aircraft system opportunities for the Indian market.
